Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: October 12, 2012
Episode Order: 6

Me and Mrs. Jones is a comedy series broadcast on BBC One. Gemma's life involves mainly driving her twin daughters around and having to deal with her ex, Jason, and his Swedish girlfriend. After handsome single father Tom asks her out and her son returns from travelling with friend Billy, Gemma finds she has more than one love interest.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32947)
